data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy Tab A 6 (SM-T280), Android Lollipop 5.1.1
data.actual_result: The lock is the normal color, as if it's not muted. (accidentally self-denied)
data.expected_result: The lock will be darker, like the icon and rest of the text (like it is on desktop)
data.short_description: In the new channel UI, the lock icon is not dark for muted channels.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure a locked text channel (you can access it because of special perms) is muted - Open that server but be in a different channel - Open the channel drawer and look at the locked muted channel
